q: Al-Qaida attacks on the United States had been planned and where U.S. retaliation was imminent.`` He asked that I take a look at the shape of our military plans on Iraq,'' Donald Rumsfeld writes. Two weeks after the worst terrorist attack in our nation's history, those of us in the Department of Defense were fully occupied, Donald Rumsfeld recalls.
